summary: All previously reported configuration and parsing issues were addressed with safe env parsing and required JWT secret validation, and no new blocking problems were introduced.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: JWT secret ID env var declared but not used, breaking ES256/JWKS trust setup
previous_issues_status.notes: The loader now reads AGENT_JWT_SECRET_ID into jwtSecretId and validates it when enabled.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Unsafe boolean and numeric env parsing that ignored explicit false and valid 0 values
previous_issues_status.notes: parseBoolEnv/parseIntEnv helpers are used throughout to handle false/0 and NaN safely.

previous_issues_status.original_issue: Missing runtime validation for required JWT secretId
previous_issues_status.notes: Throws an error when enabled and jwtSecretId is missing.
